events.event_name: 20th session of the Standing Committee of the 14th NPC
events.description: A legislative session in Beijing to finalize draft laws and adjust the legislative agenda.

events.event_name: Annual full meeting of the National People’s Congress
events.description: China's most significant political event where leaders set economic growth targets and fiscal strategies.

facts.fact_text: The Standing Committee of the 14th National People’s Congress will hold its 20th session in Beijing on Wednesday.
entities_mentioned: Standing Committee of the 14th National People’s Congress

evidences.evidence_text: The Standing Committee of the 14th National People’s Congress (NPC), China’s top legislative body, will hold its 20th session in Beijing on Wednesday.

facts.fact_text: The annual full meeting of the National People’s Congress opens on March 5.

evidences.evidence_text: the annual full meeting, which opens on March 5.

claims.claim_text: February sessions traditionally serve to finalize draft laws and adjust the legislative agenda in preparation for the annual meeting.

evidences.evidence_text: February sessions traditionally serve to finalize draft laws, gather public input, and adjust the legislative agenda in preparation for the annual full meeting

claims.claim_text: The March gathering is China’s most consequential political event of the year.

evidences.evidence_text: That gathering is China’s most consequential political event of the year

links.source_ref: Annual full meeting of the National People’s Congress

evidence.evidence_text: where senior leaders outline policy priorities, set economic growth targets

links.source_ref: Annual full meeting of the National People’s Congress

evidence.evidence_text: announce fiscal strategies, and introduce major reform measures.
